climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Gentle cleansing: Effective, yet gentle to sensitive skin, this face cleanser helps remove dirt, oil and makeup without drying the skin; ideal for daily use
Ingredients for sensitive skin: Formulated to avoid common chemical irritants and harsh cleansing agents; betaine-free, gluten-free, soap-free, and botanical extract-free
Soothing formula: Free of sulfates, dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde releasers
Dermatologist tested: This non-comedogenic cleanser won’t clog pores; awarded the Seal of Acceptance from the National Eczema Association
Please note: There are no fragrances or masking fragrances in Vanicream products, but there may be a slightly different aroma to each batch; packaging may vary
body.description: Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser has been formulated to avoid harsh detergents and common chemical irritants. Effective, yet gentle to sensitive skin. It helps remove dirt, oil and makeup without drying the skin. Leaves skin feeling clean and soft. Ideal for dry skin associated with eczema, psoriasis, ichthyosis, and winter itch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Active Vanicream user
reviews.reviewText: If you're on the hunt for a fragrance-free, gentle cleanser that caters to scent sensitivity, Vanicream might just be the answer to your skincare prayers. As someone who has struggled with skin sensitivities and the dreaded fragrance-triggered reactions, I can confidently say that Vanicream has been a game-changer in my skincare routine.One of the standout features of Vanicream is its complete absence of fragrance. For individuals like me, who cringe at the thought of harsh artificial scents causing irritation, this product is a breath of fresh air. The unscented formula is a godsend for those with scent sensitivity or easily irritated skin, as it eliminates the risk of triggering any unwanted reactions.However, it's important to note that the lack of scent is a double-edged sword. While it ensures a gentle and non-irritating cleansing experience, it does come with a drawback – Vanicream can be a tad drying on the skin. Personally, I've found that using a moisturizer immediately after cleansing helps counterbalance this issue. I would highly recommend incorporating a quality moisturizer into your routine to keep your skin feeling nourished and hydrated.Now, let's talk about the results. After diligently using Vanicream for a considerable period, I can confidently say that my skin has undergone a noticeable transformation. My complexion feels clearer, and my skin appears healthier and more balanced since I started using this product. While the dryness issue is easily manageable with a moisturizer, the benefits to my skin's overall health and appearance have been well worth it.In conclusion, Vanicream is a fantastic option for individuals with scent sensitivity and those seeking a gentle, fragrance-free cleanser. While it may leave your skin slightly parched, the inclusion of a moisturizer can easily combat this concern. Personally, my skin hasn't felt this healthy and revitalized in quite some time. If you're willing to give a little extra TLC to your skin in the form of a moisturizer, Vanicream could very well become your new skincare staple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice cleanser. Hypoallergenic. I have no issues with any Vani Care products. Recommended by my dermatologist. Works well, Very economical. Plan to continue to use these products for a long while. Smells nice, lathers good, leaves skin smooth and clean. Not oily,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for dry, sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I believe this may be the very best in moisturizing, unscented facial product (because scent will normally add dryness to any mixture of skin products); it was recommended by my dermatologist. Creamy, washes off instantly with clean washcloth. Leaves a great feel on my face. Doesn't burn my eyes. I won't be trying any other product as long as this is on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Solution for Sensitive Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about this cleanser. It's been a game-changer for my sensitive skin. I have been trying expensive cleaners through beauty box subscriptions, but I always end up coming back to Vanicream.Gentle & Effective: This cleanser lives up to its name. It's incredibly gentle on my skin, yet it effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities.No Irritation: As someone with sensitive skin, I'm always cautious about what I use. Vanicream's formula, free of common irritants, has never caused any redness or discomfort.Hydrating: Unlike some cleansers that leave your skin feeling tight and dry, this one leaves it feeling soft and hydrated.Pump Dispenser: The pump dispenser is a small but much-appreciated detail. It makes the product easy to use and helps to minimize waste.Great Value: You get a 8 fl oz bottle, and a little goes a long way. It's an excellent value for the quality you receive.Overall, Vanicream Gentle Facial Cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine. It's gentle, effective, and perfect for anyone with sensitive skin. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This facial cleaner is a good basic facial cleaner
reviews.reviewText: This facial cleaner is effective but gentle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a repeat buyer of this and many other Vanicream products. This is one of the best cleansers I have used, and I have tried a lot. It does not dry out my face or have a scent. It removes all the gunk and even makeup after a day. I pair it with the Vanicream moisturizer and using both has improved my skin. I no longer have dry spots or oily spots. It has helped even it all out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For sensitive skin, unscented
reviews.reviewText: I've tried all sorts of facial products in all different price ranges. I was having a lot of sebaceous issues with my skin, and my dermatologist suggested I try this face wash. I've been using it for over a year now. It is readily available on Amazon, or in drug stores, and is affordable. More importantly, it is gentle on my skin, and I've seen much improvement since using it. I'm not a fan of scented products, and this is truly unscented!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you need a mild soap, this is the perfect option
reviews.reviewText: Soap so mild that it leaves the skin clean and without an overwhelming aroma.

reviews.reviewTitle: This marks either my fifth or sixth purchase,
reviews.reviewText: This marks either my fifth or sixth purchase, and I'm sticking with it. It's become the perfect cleanser for me. I no longer stress about potential breakouts or irritation – it has never once irritated my skin or caused any breakouts. The fact that it's scent-free is like a blessing in a bottle. Trust me, I'm not exaggerating ,If you have sensitive skin like mine, you'll relate to my excitement in finding the perfect product that suits your concerns. I can't recommend it enough— all my friends have started using it.

I am allergic to balsam of peru,allergy to Propolis, gold sodium thiosulfate, textile dyes,..etc. I tried all the different brand but nothing suitable for me until someone recommend me to try vanicream cleanser. I was so scared when I used the first time but wow my skin was ok no red or hot or allergy at all. The next day I used again again I start to love it alot, my skin feel clean, soft and comfortable. I will deffinetly buying it again and again. I am not sure vanicream moisturizer will be the same ingredients or not, if it the same I will buy it too.
